comments.body: Why was this moved down below the check?
@graywolf336  I think its cheaper for the system to check first if the parameters are in their  correct type than to check if the user is valid, but i am not sure.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +6,10 @@
		unless Meteor.userId()
			throw new Meteor.Error 'error-invalid-user', 'Invalid user', { method: 'addRoomOwner' }

		unless RocketChat.authz.hasPermission Meteor.userId(), 'set-owner', rid
